channel.title: TormentedX 317 Economy - Quests - Minigames - Great PvM
channel.description:
This server is soley based on economy. While there are a great amount of shops, most of the items are earned from drops, skilling, questing, minigames, etc. There are thousands of obtainable items and as you can see, PvM is a great factor in the server. If you need my help or would like to join the TormentedX skype group, add my skype: mabrox97
We just came out today!!
www.TormentedX.com
Some Features:
Skills: Perfect combat All 24 skills are fully trainable, even farming, construction, etc Skilling arena to help you level up Ancient and lunar magic Ancient curses, so you can use that amazing turmoil 100% working range and magic Great leveling up Double XP events Real pking and drops, just like Runescape!
Minigames:
Onslaught Zombies Pyramid Plunder Domination Tower Barrows Pest Control Duel Arena Castle Wars Tzhaar Fight Caves Tzhaar Fight Pits Barbarian Assault Warrior's Guild Fishing Trawler
Monsters: Frost Dragons Complete GWD, with all 4 gods Giant Mole, with real burrowing Strykywerms Tormented Demons Kalphite Queen KBD Daggonoth Kings Chaos Elemental Everlasting Nomad Corporal Beast Dungeoneering Monsters Complete Brimhaven Dungeon Complete Taverly Dungeon Complete Slayer Tower Complete Varrock Sewers 100+ Other Spawned NPC's to be trained on.
Items: ALL Chaotic Weapons Extreme Potions Royal Torva Dicing and Gambling Few Customs Dragon Claws Koraski Ceremonial Colored Whips ALL THE NEW ITEMS ON RUNESCAPE
Others: Fully working clan chat Epic pets to use Unique Donator system Beautiful interfaces and the classic combat with no EoC shit Many Quests to use Tons of areas to explore Flowing economy
[img]http://i.imgur.com/3ynMD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/B02gYmS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/mQohC.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/MtI4s.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/fCtH4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NkhNV.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QJMsv.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/U1wc1.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/S9o8R.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sQItT.png[/img]

There are thousands of obtainable items and as you can see, PvM is a great factor in the server.
